name: ScenicBackgrounds
0:
”Alexa open scenic backgrounds”
”Alexa ask scenic backgrounds to play a fireplace”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scenic backgrounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Turn your Alexa device into a peaceful escape with a variety of ambient videos, from calming fireplaces and soothing white noise to peaceful ocean scenes.

CATEGORIES
Fireplaces
White Noise
Ocean Waves
Rain
Outer Space
Sunsets
And more!

PREMIUM
Take your relaxation to the next level with Scenic Backgrounds Premium. Enhance your experience with these exclusive features, accessible with a one-time payment – no subscription needed:
• Extended Play - Play videos longer, even non-stop!
• Exclusive Content - Unlock a selection of premium videos, meticulously curated for your relaxation needs.
• Audio Immersion - Choose to turn off the visuals and immerse yourself purely in the soothing ambient sounds.

SUPPORTED DEVICES
Remember, Scenic Backgrounds is available only on Alexa-enabled devices with a screen.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
